original_title: Ben Fogle: Inside the Lost City of America
overview: Ben Fogle heads to Slab City in the Sonora desert, California, to explore a unique, off-grid, alternative lifestyle community who live in the 'last free place in America'. It's a place where there is no mains water, electricity, sewer, or rubbish collection, and people survive in intense summer temperatures.
title: Ben Fogle: Inside the Lost City of America
